channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Confusing road markings, 14th July
item.description:
The curved line here causes confusion at this crossroads, because drivers turning right onto Clarence Road (coming towards and across this point of view) believe they have priority over oncoming vehicles going straight on.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint Georges Place, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 13th July
item.description:
There are potholes from Dinglewell infant School (Hucclecote) down to Lynmouth Road. Awful for cars and cyclists. Very dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dinglewell, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Entire pavement missing outside our home, obstructing our driveway and melting on the roadside, 13th July
item.description:
Outside 31 Paddocks Lane, our home, the entire pavement has been lifted by National Grid due to a power cut that took place on 9 July 2025. We have received no communication as to when the destruction will be fixed and it is impeding access to our driveway which is causing us particular issues as I have a mobility problem. The rubble left behind is melting in the heat causing a bigger area of disruption and the exposed pipe works now appear to have brown liquid puddling around them. Please can we have an update on when this will be fixed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Paddocks Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loud Clanking Noise of Drain cover, 13th July
item.description:
Loose, rattling drain cover is making a loud clanking noise every time cars drive over it. This noise is constant as it’s a busy road. Adjacent to 18 Newcourt Park, located on Moorend Road. Please fix the drain rattling noise problem.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Moorend Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
